name: Check Key Vault Certificates Expiration

on:
  push: 
    branches:
      - feature/check-keyvauly-cert-expiration
    
jobs:
  check-certificates:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Check Out Changes
        uses: actions/checkout@24cb9080177205b6e8c946b17badbe402adc938f

      - name: Get Runner IP
        run: echo "::set-output name=runner_ip::$(curl https://ifconfig.me)"
        id: runner_ip

      - name: Connect to VPN & Login into Azure
        uses: ./.github/actions/vpn-azure
        with:
          tls-key: ${{ secrets.TLS_KEY }}
          ca-cert: ${{ secrets.CA_CRT}}
          user-crt: ${{ secrets.USER_CRT }}
          user-key: ${{ secrets.USER_KEY }}
          sp-creds: ${{ secrets.SERVICE_PRINCIPAL_CREDS }}

      - name: Add Runner IP to Key Vault Firewall
        uses: azure/cli@v1
        with:
          inlineScript: |
            az keyvault network-rule add --name pdhstaging-keyvault --ip-address ${{ steps.runner_ip.outputs.runner_ip }}

      - name: List certificates
        run: |
          az keyvault certificate list --vault-name pdhstaging-keyvault -o json > certificates.json
          cat certificates.json

      - name: Filter certificates expiring within 300 days
        run: |
          jq --argjson threshold "$(date -u -d "+300 days" +%s)" '.[] | select((.attributes.expires | strptime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S%Z") | mktime) <= $threshold)' certificates.json > expiring_certificates.json
          cat expiring_certificates.json

      - name: Send Slack notification
        run: |
          expiring_certificates=$(cat expiring_certificates.json)
          if [[ "$expiring_certificates" != "[]" ]]; then
            curl -X POST -H 'Content-type: application/json' --data "{'text': 'Azure Key Vault Certificates Expiring in 30 Days:', 'attachments': $expiring_certificates}" ${{ secrets.SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL }}
          else
            echo "No certificates expiring within 300 days."
          fi

      - name: Remove Runner IP to Key Vault Firewall
        run: az keyvault network-rule remove --name pdhstaging-keyvault --ip-address $runner_ip
